root.name: Bust-A-Move 3 DX
root.description: Overview Bust-A-Move 3 DX is very much like the other games in the series. The object is to clear the screen by shooting colored balls at the ones currently on the play field. By matching 3 or more of the same color, the colored balls will be removed from the play field. Bust-A-Move 3 DX would later be remade for American audiences and renamed to Bust-A-Move 99. Modes: Bust-A-Move 3 DX features five different modes of play Arcade ModeChallenge ModeWin Contest ModeCollection ModeEdit Mode
